verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Over all the earth
You reign on high
Every mountain stream
Every sunset sky

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
But my one request
Lord, my only aim
Is that you reign in me again

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord, reign in me
Reign in your power
Over all my dreams
In my darkest hour
You are the Lord of all I am
So won't you reign in me again?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Over every thought
Over every word
May my life reflect
The beauty of my Lord

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
'Cause you mean more to me
Than any earthly thing
So won't you reign in me again?

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Lord, reign in me
Reign in your power
Over all my dreams
In my darkest hour
You are the Lord of all I am
So won't you reign in me again?
image: http://static.urx.io/units/web/urx-unit-loader.gif

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Over all the earth
You reign on high
Every mountain stream
Every sunset sky

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
But my one request
Lord, my only aim
Is that you reign in me again

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Lord, reign in me
Reign in your power
Over all my dreams
In my darkest hour
You are the Lord of all I am
So won't you reign in me again?

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Lord, reign in me
Reign in your power
Over all my dreams
In my darkest hour
You are the Lord of all I am
So won't you reign in me again?

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Won't you reign?
Won't you reign in me again?
Come and praise the Lord
Won't you reign in me again?
